okay so i used [beautiful jekyll](https://beautifuljekyll.com/) shout out to Dean Attali !
* Steps to create your own:-
	1. Head to [this](https://beautifuljekyll.com) , and click get started.
	2. Fork the project.
	3. Rename the project to  `<yourusername>.github.io`
	4. Customize your website settings by editing **_config.yml** 
	>dont panic you'll understand everything when you'll head to beautiful jekyll github repo
	 
	 5. Voila your website is ready.
	 6. Files you create inside the [`_posts`](https://github.com/daattali/beautiful-jekyll/blob/master/_posts) directory will be treated as blog entries. You can look at the existing files there to get an idea of how to write blog posts. Note the format of the blog post files - they must follow the naming convention of **`YEAR-MONTH-DAY-title.md`**. After you successfully add your own post, you can delete the existing files inside [`_posts`](https://github.com/daattali/beautiful-jekyll/blob/master/_posts) to remove the sample posts, as those are just demo posts to help you learn.
	 7. To add pages to your site, you can either write a markdown file (`.md`) or you can write an HTML file. It's much easier to write markdown than HTML, so I suggest you do that ([here's a great tutorial](https://markdowntutorial.com/) it will hardly take 10 minutes to learn.
	 8. Now your vlog website is up!

		  ![Thumbs up cat](data:image/jpeg;base64,)

  **btw if you have any doubt or you get stuck at anything feel free to contact me**

> and i know my writing skills sucks! thanks :)
